data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: Sally rode her horse down the canal. She knew her horse was running low on energy so needed to stop soon. She saw a barge selling a variety of things so decided to stop to see if she could refuel. Her pump style shoes were worn out so she had to stay atop her horse whilst speaking to the barge owner. She joked about her horse being neither petrol or diesel but infact, ran on carrots!
data.original_output: Sally rode her horse down the canal. She knew her horse was running low on energy so needed to stop soon. She saw a barge selling a variety of things so decided to stop to see if she could refuel. Her pump style shoes were worn out so she had to stay atop her horse whilst speaking to the barge owner. She joked about her horse being neither petrol or diesel but infact, ran on carrots!

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: Julia awoke to a'stamp stamp stamp' from the above flat for the third day in a row! She decided to send for the warden, she had had enough of it! When the warden turned up she knew she would be polite but in her mind she would be full of extremeties all in capital letters!

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: The brass band had never had an organ player before so it was something new to all of them. Some of them were a bit unsure but they couldn't turn down the opportunity to play with a member of the british empire!! They just hope the organ player would comply with the etiquettes they had as a band.

They just hope the organ player would comply with the etiquettes they had as a band.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: He tapped his card to make the payment for the drugs. He felt a relief and having the drugs and knew this now meant he would not have to exist much longer, the feelings of gloom would soon be over.
